com.ttn.WebAutomation.utillib

Class AXE.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ttn.WebAutomation.utillib.AXE.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AXE

    public static class AXE.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Chainable builder for invoking aXe. Instantiate a new Builder and configure testing with the include(), exclude(), and options() methods before calling analyze() to run.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver, java.net.URL script)
      Initializes the Builder class to chain configuration before analyzing pages.
